text.#text:
Notwithstanding any

and who is the

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To delay the enforcement of any rulings of the National
		  Labor Relations Board until there is a final resolution in pending lawsuits.
